**Example 1: 永久踢除用户**

示例

Input: 

```
tccli lcic KickUserFromRoom --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --RoomId 313337981 \
    --SdkAppId 3520371 \
    --UserId 2PMcgEVHi9CMWq6tmfNnPGUkEGn \
    --KickType 2 \
    --Duration 0
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "3f156f86-9939-4ea0-aee7-81d32fa46c3f"
    }
}
```
